# HivePy

Unofficial flexible library for [HexWay Hive](https://hexway.io/hive/) Rest API.

#### Tested on HexWay Hive 0.62.8

## Installation
```bash
TBD
```

## Dependencies

- pydantic ~= 2.4
- requests ~= 2.31.0

## Usage
### Simple HiveClient
```python
def main() -> None:
    ... # TBD
    
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


```
